text: Problem with : `The onFormSubmit function in hbspt.forms.create requires jQuery. It was not run.` any solution ?
Let me check with the forms team, I think this is actually supposed to work without jQuery.
Hi Ankit, if you can DM me to the page youâ€™re seeing this error on that would be helpful

Hi <@U7SL518D6>, I was working on a custom form module, with AJAX request. And I got this error, its the same for onFormReady function too. But for now I am using ''onFormSubmitted' event as a workaround. So far so good. But you guys should look into this error with jQuery.
If you can send a link to the module you experienced this with I can pass this along to the forms team so they can more quickly see and reproduce the issue, speeding resolution
